languages.text: "Не только проблемами в будущем, но и жертвами в настоящем — как Лорд-капитан, увы, уже имел{mf||а} неудовольствие убедиться лично".
"Not only problems in the future, but casualties in the present — as the Lord Captain has, alas, already had the misfortune of seeing for {mf|himself|herself}."
languages.original_text: "Не только проблемами в будущем, но и жертвами в настоящем — как Лорд-капитан, увы, уже имел{mf||а} неудовольствие убедиться лично".

traits.locale_text: "Not only problems in the future, but casualties in the present — as the Lord Captain has, alas, already had the misfortune of seeing for {mf|himself|herself}."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Not only problems in the future, but casualties in the present — as the Lord Captain has, alas, already had the misfortune of seeing for {mf|himself|herself}."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Not only problems in the future, but casualties in the present — as the Lord Captain has, alas, already had the misfortune of seeing for {mf|himself|herself}."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Not only problems in the future, but casualties in the present — as the Lord Captain has, alas, already had the misfortune of seeing for {mf|himself|herself}."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “不仅是将来会有问题，眼下已经造成了伤亡……唉，遗憾的是，我们的舰长大人已经亲眼目睹了这一点。”
languages.original_text: "Not only problems in the future, but casualties in the present — as the Lord Captain has, alas, already had the misfortune of seeing for {mf|himself|herself}."

traits.locale_text: “不仅是将来会有问题，眼下已经造成了伤亡……唉，遗憾的是，我们的舰长大人已经亲眼目睹了这一点。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « C'est déjà le cas, comme {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a pu s'en rendre compte par {mf|lui-même|elle-même}. »
languages.original_text: "Not only problems in the future, but casualties in the present — as the Lord Captain has, alas, already had the misfortune of seeing for {mf|himself|herself}."

traits.locale_text: « C'est déjà le cas, comme {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a pu s'en rendre compte par {mf|lui-même|elle-même}. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «No solo habrá problemas futuros, sino muertes en el presente, como {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ya ha podido presenciar».
languages.original_text: "Not only problems in the future, but casualties in the present — as the Lord Captain has, alas, already had the misfortune of seeing for {mf|himself|herself}."

traits.locale_text: «No solo habrá problemas futuros, sino muertes en el presente, como {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ya ha podido presenciar».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「問題は将来だけじゃない、今だって散々だよ…ロード・キャプテンは残念なことに、もう不運を目の当たりにしてるんだから」
languages.original_text: "Not only problems in the future, but casualties in the present — as the Lord Captain has, alas, already had the misfortune of seeing for {mf|himself|herself}."

traits.locale_text: 「問題は将来だけじゃない、今だって散々だよ…ロード・キャプテンは残念なことに、もう不運を目の当たりにしてるんだから」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Nicht nur Probleme in der Zukunft, auch Opfer in der Gegenwart — wie der Lord Captain leider selbst miterleben musste."
languages.original_text: "Not only problems in the future, but casualties in the present — as the Lord Captain has, alas, already had the misfortune of seeing for {mf|himself|herself}."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht nur Probleme in der Zukunft, auch Opfer in der Gegenwart — wie der Lord Captain leider selbst miterleben musste."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Not only problems in the future, but casualties in the present — as the Lord Captain has, alas, already had the misfortune of seeing for {mf|himself|herself}."

languages.text: "Gelecekte soruna yol açacak olsa neyse. Lord Kaptan'ın kendi gözleriyle görmek zorunda kaldığı üzere şu anda da kayıplar yaşamamıza neden oluyor."
languages.original_text: "Not only problems in the future, but casualties in the present — as the Lord Captain has, alas, already had the misfortune of seeing for {mf|himself|herself}."

traits.locale_text: "Gelecekte soruna yol açacak olsa neyse. Lord Kaptan'ın kendi gözleriyle görmek zorunda kaldığı üzere şu anda da kayıplar yaşamamıza neden oluyor."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
